title: Isa TK+
resume: Isa TK+ the second season of the original Nickelodeon Latin America production : Isa TKM. In co-production with Sony Pictures Television and Teleset of Colombia. Production started in July 2009 and its official release was 28 September 2009 in Hispanic America. The release in Brazil was on 5 April 2010 and of the United States is not confirmed.
